title: LF plat+ support to duo with
body:
Hey guys.

Looking to find a support to duo and become a solid bot lane with. I hope to trial for teams as a duo and really make a solid friend. I am currently plat 5 and really wish to have a friend who uses coms so we can duo, hang out, get better and climb to our desired rank! 

I am not looking for someone who is negative or toxic. Really want a positive person because when we grow we need to be able sit and talk about what happened and get better. I have a lot of experience in teams and have won 3 tournaments so i know that making a solid partnership takes time and heaps of work! Which I am committed to doing! 

Please add my main "i love miya" <3

replies.body: Im not plat but if you wanna try some normal games I'm happy to run some duo strats
